players.name: Bob
memory: The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Diana: "Bob, I think you're trying to distract us from the real killer."
You: "Charlie, can you tell us what you saw last night?"
Charlie: "Bob, I think Diana is trying to distract us from the real killer."
